item.title: Epistle of Polycarp to the Philippians
item.description: Listen to the Audio Version Greeting Polycarp, and the presbyters with him, to the Church of God sojourning at Philippi: Mercy to you, and peace from God Almighty, and from the Lord Jesus Christ, our Saviour, be multiplied.
